sense.def:
A pledge
je slovesna obljuba, da bomo nekaj naredili.

seg.quote: The Government should fulfil its 1979 Manifesto pledge.
He gave a pledge to handle the affair in a friendly manner.

sense.def:
To pledge something
pomeni slovesno obljubiti, da bomo nekaj naredili ali dali.

seg.quote: They will pledge $1 million to fund the project.
The government pledged to reduce the level of imports.
He has pledged that the ban will be lifted after two years.

sense.def:
To pledge oneself to something
pomeni obljubiti, da bomo delovali v določeni smeri ali da bomo podpirali določeno osebo, zamisel ali skupino.

seg.quote: The new organization pledged itself to the revolutionary overthrow of the dictator.
